de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Movement

Class XY

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Movement.XY

  • public class XY
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage one Items Coordinates, which contain X and Y. All possible changes are handled here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XY(int xCord, int yCord)

      • getTempXY

        public XY getTempXY(XY destinationVector)
        Get a XY Object which contains a temporary Object from the Destination, so it's possible to change things, to check if the Position is empty or something. This make's it unnecessary to set the edited Object back.
        Parameters:
        destinationVector - The Vector from the Object to the Destination as XY Object
        Returns:
        A XY Object from the Position where this Object want to go
